item.title: Workshop 2 - Classification of Political US Tweets
Workshop 3 - Advanced Applications with NLP and Networks
item.description: In this workshop we will explore some advanced applications that can be approached with M2 tooling and in combination with what you already know from M1. That includes e.g. semantic networks, semantic search, recommender systems. This workshop will also be a chance to explore potential topics for the upcoming group assignment.
